title: Automated Triage of Support Issues
text: goal issuetriager streamline triage process projects frequent issues reported GitHub. Normal use inside GitHub workflow triggered run issues opened, analyze text, use results automatic labeling, closing, notification issues. action indicates whether phrase found within text .

title: Automated Triage of Support Issues
code: on:   issues:     types: [opened]  jobs:   triage:     runs-on: ubuntu-latest     name: A job to triage issues     steps:       - name: check the text         id: triage         uses: rstudio/issuetriager@v1         with:           check-phrase: 'this is a blocking issue'           issue-body: ${{ github.event.issue.body }}       # Use the output from the `triage` step       - name: Label the issue as blocking         run: echo "The time was ${{ steps.hello.outputs.time }}"         if: ${{ steps.triage.outputs.contains-phrase }}         uses: andymckay/labeler@master         with:           add-labels: "blocking"
